movies.title: Battle Through The Heavens
movies.description: Battle Through The Heavens is an animated series based on the popular Chinese web novel of the same name. The story follows Xiao Yan, a young martial artist who, after losing all his powers, embarks on a journey of cultivation to regain his strength and uncover the mysteries of his past. Along the way, he faces fierce rivals, powerful enemies, and forms alliances with a variety of characters.
movies.tags: martial arts, cultivation, fantasy, action, adventure

movies.title: Jade Dynasty
movies.description: Jade Dynasty is an animated series based on the popular Chinese web novel *Zhu Xian*. The story follows Zhang Xiaofan, a young man who, after the massacre of his family, embarks on a path of cultivation. As he trains to become a powerful martial artist, he uncovers secrets about his lineage, faces enemies, and struggles with moral dilemmas, while exploring themes of love, loyalty, and power.
movies.studio: Tencent Penguin Pictures, Xiamen Skyloong Technology Co.
movies.tags: martial arts, cultivation, fantasy, action, adventure

movies.title: Soul Land 1
movies.description: Soul Land 1, also known as Douluo Dalu, is an animated series based on the popular Chinese novel of the same name. The story follows Tang San, a young genius of the Tang Sect, who, after sacrificing himself for forbidden knowledge, is reincarnated in a world where martial spirits are awakened. Tang San strives to master his spirit powers, uncover the truth about his reincarnation, and rise to the top of the Soul Land.
movies.tags: martial arts, cultivation, fantasy, action, adventure, reincarnation

movies.title: Soul Land 2
movies.description: Soul Land 2, also known as Douluo Dalu II, is the sequel to the popular animated series Soul Land. The story continues the journey of Tang San's descendants in a world where martial spirits are cultivated. It follows the adventures of a new generation of spirit masters, led by the young and talented Tang Wutong, as they uncover the hidden powers within the Soul Land and face powerful foes in their quest for glory and survival.
movies.tags: martial arts, cultivation, fantasy, action, adventure, reincarnation

movies.title: Swallowed Star
movies.description: Swallowed Star is a futuristic animated series based on the Chinese web novel by I Eat Tomatoes. Set in a post-apocalyptic world where humanity faces destruction from monstrous beings, Luo Feng, a young man with extraordinary determination, strives to become a powerful warrior to protect his loved ones and uncover the mysteries of the universe.
movies.studio: Tencent Penguin Pictures, Studio Motion Magic
movies.tags: post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, martial arts, action, adventure

movies.title: Throne of Seal
movies.description: Throne of Seal, also known as Shen Yin Wang Zuo, is an animated series based on the Chinese web novel by Tang Jia San Shao. The story follows Long Hao Chen, a young knight who embarks on a journey to master the path of a divine knight. Alongside his companions, he battles the forces of darkness and strives to protect humanity, uncovering secrets about his destiny and his family along the way.
movies.tags: divine knight, cultivation, fantasy, action, adventure

movies.title: Perfect World
movies.description: Perfect World follows Shi Hao, a boy born with an extraordinary fate. The story explores his journey through a chaotic world full of mystical powers, powerful enemies, and complex relationships as he aims to cultivate to the peak and unlock the mysteries of the universe.
movies.tags: cultivation, martial arts, fantasy, adventure, supernatural

movies.title: Martial Universe
movies.description: Martial Universe follows Lin Dong, a young martial artist who discovers a mysterious talisman that propels him into a world of powerful sects, hidden treasures, and fierce battles. As he grows stronger, he uncovers secrets about his family's past and the greater destiny awaiting him.
movies.tags: martial arts, cultivation, adventure, fantasy, action

movies.title: Dragon Prince Yuan
movies.description: Dragon Prince Yuan follows the journey of Yuan, a young cultivator destined for greatness. With the fate of his empire hanging in the balance, he embarks on an arduous path of cultivation, forging alliances and battling formidable foes to unlock his true potential.
movies.tags: martial arts, cultivation, adventure, fantasy, action

movies.title: The Great Ruler
movies.description: The Great Ruler follows Mu Chen, a talented young martial artist who embarks on a journey to reach the pinnacle of cultivation. Along the way, he encounters powerful enemies, forms strong alliances, and unravels the mysteries of the universe.
movies.tags: martial arts, cultivation, adventure, fantasy, action

movies.title: The King's Avatar
movies.description: The King's Avatar follows Ye Xiu, a top-tier esports player who is forced to retire from his team. However, he does not give up and makes a comeback by starting anew in the game Glory, climbing his way back to the top with his exceptional skills and deep understanding of the game.

movies.title: The War of Cards
movies.description: The War of Cards follows a young strategist who discovers a mysterious deck of magical cards that hold immense power. As he delves deeper into the secrets of the cards, he finds himself caught in a grand conflict that will determine the fate of the world.

movies.title: A Will Eternal
movies.description: A Will Eternal follows Bai Xiaochun, a mischievous but kind-hearted young cultivator who seeks immortality out of his fear of death. His journey is filled with humor, adventure, and intense battles as he grows in strength and wisdom.

movies.title: Rakshasa Street
movies.description: Rakshasa follows the tale of a young warrior who must navigate a world filled with demons, ancient secrets, and powerful cultivators in order to uncover the truth behind his mysterious past.
movies.tags: martial arts, supernatural, demons, action, fantasy

movies.title: Fog Hill of Five Elements
movies.description: Fog Hill of Five Elements tells the story of a world where elemental powers govern everything, and warriors must harness their abilities to fight against mysterious creatures threatening humanity.
movies.tags: martial arts, supernatural, elements, action, fantasy

movies.title: Cinderella Chef
movies.description: Cinderella Chef follows a modern-day chef who is transported back in time to ancient China, where she must use her culinary skills to survive and navigate a world filled with intrigue and romance.
movies.tags: romance, historical, time travel, cooking, drama

movies.title: Link Click
movies.description: Link Click follows two young men who run a mysterious photography studio, using their unique ability to enter photographs and alter events of the past to help their clients resolve regrets and mysteries.
movies.tags: mystery, supernatural, time travel, drama, sci-fi

movies.title: Heaven Official's Blessing
movies.description: Heaven Official's Blessing tells the story of Xie Lian, a beloved prince and powerful martial god who, after multiple banishments, ascends to the heavens once again and encounters the mysterious and charming ghost king, Hua Cheng.

movies.title: Fairies Album
movies.description: Fairies Album follows the adventures of a divine doctor who travels the lands, helping spirits and mythical creatures with their ailments while uncovering ancient secrets and legends.

movies.title: The Daily Life of the Immortal King
movies.description: The Daily Life of the Immortal King follows Wang Ling, a near-invincible cultivator who wishes to live a normal high school life but constantly faces challenges that threaten to expose his true abilities.
movies.tags: comedy, fantasy, school life, supernatural, cultivation

movies.title: One Punch Man
movies.description: One Punch Man follows Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, as he searches for a worthy challenge in a world full of powerful monsters and villains.
movies.tags: action, comedy, superhero, martial arts, parody

movies.title: Naruto: Legend of the Stone of Gelel
movies.description: Naruto and his team embark on a mission involving a mysterious mineral known as the Stone of Gelel, encountering powerful enemies and uncovering a hidden conflict along the way.
movies.tags: action, adventure, ninja, fantasy, martial arts

movies.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Hinokami Chronicles
movies.description: Tanjiro and his companions embark on a new journey filled with intense battles and emotional struggles as they continue their quest to defeat the demons threatening humanity.

movies.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
movies.description: Jujutsu Kaisen follows Yuji Itadori, a high school student who joins a secret organization of Jujutsu Sorcerers to eliminate powerful curses after he accidentally becomes the host of the most dangerous curse, Sukuna.
movies.tags: curses, exorcists, supernatural battles, dark fantasy

movies.title: Spy x Family: Code White
movies.description: Spy x Family: Code White follows the Forger family as they embark on a new mission. Loid, Yor, and Anya find themselves caught in a high-stakes adventure that threatens world peace, testing their bond as a family.

movies.title: Naruto the Movie: Guardians of the Crescent Moon Kingdom
movies.description: Naruto, Sakura, Rock Lee, and Kakashi are assigned to protect the prince of the Land of the Moon. During their journey, they face unexpected dangers as a sinister plot unfolds, threatening the kingdom and their mission.

movies.title: UniteUp! -Uni:Birth-
movies.description: A new chapter in the UniteUp! series, following the journey of aspiring idols as they overcome obstacles and grow together in the competitive world of music entertainment.
movies.tags: idols, music, drama, slice of life

movies.title: Ahiru no Sora
movies.description: Ahiru no Sora follows Sora Kurumatani, a short but determined basketball player who joins a high school team full of delinquents. With his unwavering spirit and passion for the sport, he strives to turn the team into true competitors.
movies.tags: basketball, sports, high school, competition, friendship

movies.title: Spy x Family
movies.description: Spy x Family follows the elite spy Twilight, who must create a fake family to complete a crucial mission. Unbeknownst to him, his pretend wife is an assassin, and his adopted daughter is a telepath. Together, they navigate hilarious and action-packed challenges while keeping their true identities secret.
movies.tags: spy, comedy, family, action, secret identity

movies.title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
movies.description: After being killed in an unfortunate stabbing incident, Satoru Mikami finds himself reincarnated in a fantasy world as a slime named Rimuru. With unique abilities, he embarks on an adventure to create a new world where all races can coexist peacefully.

movies.title: Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead
movies.description: Akira Tendou, a corporate slave, finds himself in a zombie apocalypse. Instead of fear, he sees it as freedom from his mundane life. With a newfound sense of adventure, he sets out to complete his bucket list before becoming one of the undead.

movies.title: A Journey Through Another World
movies.description: A young protagonist is transported to a mysterious fantasy world where magic and adventure await. As he navigates this new realm, he discovers hidden powers, forms alliances, and faces formidable foes on his quest for survival.

movies.title: Dan Da Dan
movies.description: Dan Da Dan is a supernatural action-comedy anime that follows two high school students, Momo Ayase and Okarun, who get caught up in bizarre paranormal events. Momo, a believer in ghosts but not aliens, and Okarun, who believes in aliens but not ghosts, challenge each other's beliefs—only to discover that both exist. Their journey leads them into encounters with terrifying spirits, extraterrestrials, and hidden supernatural forces.

movies.title: Goblin Slayer
movies.description: Goblin Slayer is a dark fantasy anime that follows a lone warrior known as the Goblin Slayer, whose only goal is the complete eradication of goblins. In a world where adventurers seek fame and fortune by fighting powerful monsters, he dedicates himself solely to eliminating goblins, using brutal tactics and precise strategies. Along the way, he forms an unlikely party with a young priestess, an elf archer, a dwarf shaman, and a lizardman priest.

movies.title: Loner Life in Another World
movies.description: Loner Life in Another World follows Haruka, an introverted high school student who, along with his classmates, is transported to a fantasy world. Unlike the others, he does not receive a special role or powerful abilities, leading him to embark on a solitary adventure. With his unique skills and resourcefulness, he thrives in the new world, overcoming challenges while avoiding unnecessary social interactions.

movies.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: The Movie
movies.description: Oggy and the Cockroaches: The Movie follows the hilarious and chaotic battles between Oggy, the lazy blue cat, and the three mischievous cockroaches—Joey, Dee Dee, and Marky. As Oggy tries to enjoy a peaceful life, the cockroaches constantly disrupt his world with their pranks, leading to a series of wild and comedic adventures.

movies.title: Tom and Jerry: The Fast and the Furry
movies.description: Tom and Jerry: The Fast and the Furry follows the iconic cat-and-mouse duo as they enter an epic, high-speed race around the world. With their home destroyed, they compete for a luxurious mansion as the grand prize. Facing off against outrageous competitors, dodging hilarious obstacles, and engaging in classic slapstick chaos, Tom and Jerry do whatever it takes to win!

movies.title: Pink Panther
movies.description: The Pink Panther follows the adventures of a clever and mischievous pink feline who always finds himself in humorous and unexpected situations. With his silent but expressive antics, he outwits foes, solves mysteries, and delivers classic slapstick comedy that has entertained audiences for generations.

movies.title: We Bare Bears: The Origin
movies.description: We Bare Bears: The Origin delves into the backstory of the beloved bear brothers—Grizz, Panda, and Ice Bear. It explores their early adventures, how they met, and the challenges they faced while trying to find a home in the human world. Filled with heartwarming moments and comedy, this prequel offers deeper insight into their bond.

movies.title: WALL-E
movies.description: WALL-E is a heartwarming animated sci-fi film that follows the journey of a lonely waste-collecting robot left to clean an abandoned Earth. When he encounters EVE, a sleek reconnaissance robot, his life takes an unexpected turn as they embark on a cosmic adventure that could change the fate of humanity.
movies.tags: sci-fi, space, adventure, robot, love, environmental

movies.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
movies.description: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series follows the hilarious misadventures of the quirky and bumbling Mr. Bean. With his signature silent comedy and a knack for getting into trouble, he navigates everyday life in the most unpredictable ways, accompanied by his beloved teddy bear.
movies.tags: comedy, slapstick, everyday life, silent humor

movies.title: Regular Show: The Movie
movies.description: Regular Show: The Movie follows Mordecai and Rigby as they embark on a time-traveling adventure to stop an evil volleyball coach from destroying the universe. With their usual mix of absurd humor and high-stakes action, the duo must set aside their differences and save the world before it's too late.

movies.title: Flow
movies.description: Flow is a unique animated film that takes viewers on a mesmerizing journey through a surreal world where water and nature intertwine. With breathtaking visuals and minimal dialogue, the story follows a lone traveler navigating an ever-changing landscape, exploring themes of solitude, discovery, and transformation.

movies.title: Steven Universe Future
movies.description: Steven Universe: The Future serves as an epilogue to the beloved animated series, following Steven as he navigates life after the great battles have ended. With the universe at peace, Steven must now confront his own struggles and personal growth, learning that not all problems can be solved with his powers alone.

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda
movies.description: Kung Fu Panda follows the journey of Po, a clumsy but lovable panda who dreams of becoming a kung fu master. When he is unexpectedly chosen as the Dragon Warrior, he must train under Master Shifu and prove himself worthy while facing powerful enemies.

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
movies.description: In Kung Fu Panda 2, Po continues his journey as the Dragon Warrior, protecting the Valley of Peace alongside the Furious Five. When a powerful villain threatens to conquer China with a deadly new weapon, Po must confront his past and unlock the secrets of inner peace to defeat him.

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
movies.description: In Kung Fu Panda 3, Po finally meets his long-lost panda father and travels to a secret panda village. As he struggles to fit in, a supernatural villain named Kai emerges, stealing the chi of kung fu masters. Po must train his fellow pandas and embrace his true destiny to stop Kai.

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
movies.description: Kung Fu Panda 4 sees Po taking on the role of a kung fu mentor while facing a new formidable enemy that threatens the balance of peace. With fresh challenges ahead, Po must prove that he is not only a great warrior but also a true leader.

movies.title: Zig and Sharko
movies.description: Zig and Sharko is a slapstick comedy series that follows the antics of Zig, a hungry hyena, who constantly devises elaborate plans to capture and eat Marina, a beautiful mermaid. However, his attempts are always foiled by Sharko, a strong and protective shark who acts as Marina's guardian.

movies.title: Minecraft: Technoblade Never Die
movies.description: A tribute to the legendary Minecraft content creator Technoblade, celebrating his legacy, achievements, and impact on the Minecraft community. Featuring iconic moments, battles, and the mantra that inspired millions: 'Technoblade Never Dies.'
